author: potuz
content: Something that the discussion with <@449019668296892420> reminded me, on ePBS, attesting as soon as the block appears should be made mandatory (of course this can't be enforced, but clients should implement this by default). The reason being that otherwise a malicious builder can make blocks that take longer than 6" to execute and less than 9". If attesters will only vote at 3" into the slot, then they will always reorg the next block, making an ex-anti reorg easier.
